keyEvents.title: Battle Against Oars Intensifies
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats battle against the giant zombie Oars under Gecko Moria's direct control on Thriller Bark.
keyEvents.significance: Major battle location where the crew faces one of their most challenging opponents.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Meets Rolling Pirates in Forest
keyEvents.description: In the forest area of Thriller Bark, Luffy encounters Charlotte Lola and the Rolling Pirates who have been hiding there for three years.
keyEvents.significance: The forest serves as the hiding place for shadowless victims and the location where Nightmare Luffy is created.

keyEvents.title: Nightmare Luffy Transformation
keyEvents.description: In Thriller Bark's forest, the Rolling Pirates implant 100 shadows into Luffy, creating the Nightmare Luffy transformation.
keyEvents.significance: Site of one of the most unique power-ups in the series.

description: The world's largest pirate ship, Thriller Bark is a massive island-sized vessel commanded by Gecko Moria. It features a haunted mansion, graveyards, forests, and is perpetually shrouded in darkness within the Florian Triangle.
